alert.note: Alert for Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area; Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 5:32PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Churchill, southern Washoe, south central Pershing and northern Lyon Counties through 630 PM PDT... At 529 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fallon, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could create blowing dust along US-50, US-95 and I-80, may knock down tree limbs, and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fallon, Lovelock, Lahontan Reservoir, Fernley, Hazen, Oreana, Middlegate, Stillwater, Unionville, Silver Springs, Trinity Junction, Junction U.S 50 And Nv 121 (Dixie Valley Rd), Junction I-80 And Nv 396/857 (exit 112), Junction U.S 50 And NV 839, Junction U.S 50 And NV 116 (Stuart Rd), Junction I 80 And U.S 95 (exit 83), Silver Hill, Frenchman, Fairview Peak and Dixie Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area; Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
